import re

def extract_urls(text):
    pattern = ''
    return re.findall(pattern, text)[:1000]

import re

def extract_urls(text):
    pattern = '(https?://www\\.[^\\s/$.?#].[^\\s]*)'
    return re.findall(pattern, text)[:1001]

import re

def extract_urls(text):
    pattern = '(https?://www\\.[^\\s/$.?#].[^\\s]*)'
